Passaic.Laurel Grove Memorial Park:
Laurel Grove Memorial Park is a cemetery in Totowa, New Jersey, United States.


== Notable interments ==
George E. Archer (1853–1903), Chief Architect of the New York, Lake Erie and Western Railroad
Robert G. Bremner (1874–1914), Representative from New Jersey's 7th congressional district from 1913-1914.
Gordon Canfield (1898–1972), Representative from New Jersey's 7th congressional district from 1941-1961.
